properties.query: [concat(variables('TableName'),'| extend ExpirationDate = todatetime(CertExpiration) | extend ExpiryStatus = case(ExpirationDate <= now(), ''Expired'', ExpirationDate <= now() + 5d, ''Expiring in 5 Days'', ''Not Expired'')| where [''TimeGenerated''] == toscalar(',variables('TableName'),' | summarize max([''TimeGenerated'']))| project ExpiryStatus, CertExpiration, CertName, CertSubject, CertRecipient,  KeyVault, CertThumbprint, [''TimeGenerated'']| sort by ExpiryStatus')]

[concat(variables('TableName'),'| where [''TimeGenerated''] == toscalar(',variables('TableName'),'| summarize max([''TimeGenerated'']))| extend ExpiryStatus = case(todatetime(CertExpiration) <= now(), ''Expired'',todatetime(CertExpiration) <= now() + 5d, ''Expiring in 5 Days'', ''Not Expired'')| summarize CertificateCount = count() by ExpiryStatus')]
